text: Hi, I am trying to upload a module and have this error. Anyone can help me with this error? What am I missing in meta.json file and do you have an example?

Anyone know if its possible to *push only changed files* via GitHub Action? Its currently pushing all files on every deploy - 'HubSpot CMS Deploy' is taking 23 seconds, or is this normal timings? Thanks for any advice or info in advance.

Current yml workflow file:
```on:
  push:
    branches:
    - master
jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v2.3.3
      - name: HubSpot CMS Deploy
        uses: HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-deploy-action@v1.6
        with:
          src_dir: public
          dest_dir: test-theme
          portal_id: ${{ secrets.HubSpot_portal_id }}
          personal_access_key: ${{ secrets.HubSpot_personal_access_key }}```
